survivor_message: You are an UA employee on the island outpost of New Varadero, it is vital that you do all that you can to contain the outbreak, or at least survive.
announce_text:
A manual distress signal has been received from United American outpost New Varadero. A response team from the ###SHIPNAME### will be dispatched shortly to investigate.
Desgination: Radio survey station

Pop: 98
Temp: 95F : 35C ext
Ranking officer: Maj. Afric Zimmerman
Telecommunications array: Repair required

No further information available at this time.
